rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Zenki and Goki deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. Then draw a card.
When Zenki and Goki dies, create a 1/2 blue Bird creature token with flying and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.”
